name: SpringBreak Massacre
description:
This game is an early Demo.

In 1994 a documentary crew traveled to Sycamore Canyon, Texas, USA. They were making a film about the disappearance of 6 teenagers in the area during the Springbreak in 1987. Teenagers car was found at a secluded spot near Devil's River 80 miles from the town of Sonora where they were last seen. The crew was retracing their last steps and were on their way to that spot. They stopped overnight at the lodge near the river.

I have been working on this game during the quarantine and willing to complete it in year 2021. any feedback is welcomed.
